text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My meeting ran over, and now I'm<n>late for my training
session with Taiki<n>Shuttle!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I arrive at the training course to find<n>Taiki standing alone,
looking utterly<n>dejected.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Wahhh! Traineeer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thud!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her tearful hug is akin to a crushing<n>tackle.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes... Sorry for breaking down on ya<n>like that, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I just can't handle flyin' solo. I get<n>so lonely that the tears
start flowing<n>nonstop.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Everything was fine while all my<n>friends were here training
and I had<n>people to talk to...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
But eventually, everybody else went<n>home, and I was left all
on my<n>lonesome. And you were nowhere to<n>be found...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's hard to tell since she's always<n>surrounded by friends,
but it seems<n>she gets lonely pretty easily.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Sob... Oh?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Sorry. Guess all that crying made me<n>hungry.
choice_data_list: Let's get something good to eat.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
To make up for missing her training<n>session, I decide to
treat Taiki to a<n>meal.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ooh, a sit-down restaurant!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Look at all the food and drinks to<n>choose from! It's like I've
died and<n>gone to heaven!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Really?! Trainer, you're as givin' as<n>the day is long!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, did that not come across? Sorry! I<n>just meant... you're
really generous!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
What should I go with? Steak? A<n>hamburger? Or maybe the
special<n>deluxe parfait?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: ...On second thought, I'll take 'em all!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I let Taiki keep ordering until her<n>stomach is sufficiently
satisfied.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...It's probably best not to dwell on<n>how light my wallet has
become.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Whew! Thank ya, Trainer! I'm so<n>full—and so happy!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: But Japanese steaks are a little on<n>the small side...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
The steaks I used to eat with my<n>family were twice—no,
three times as<n>big!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
That sure takes me back. I always<n>loved talkin' with my
family and<n>friends over a good meal.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I miss them all so much...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Taiki hangs her head sadly.<n>Considering how easily she
gets<n>lonely, the homesickness must be<n>particularly hard
on her.
choice_data_list: I'll be here for you so you don't feel lonely.
I'll be here for you so you don't feel lonely.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Gasp! Oh, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Thank ya! Thank ya very much!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I'm not going home yet! Not till I win<n>the Twinkle Series!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: My precious family and friends are<n>rootin' for me.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I love seeing their happy smiles every<n>time I win!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Seeing everybody smile is my<n>favorite thing in the whole,
wide world!<n>Nothin' makes me happier!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: So I won't let a little loneliness stop<n>me from giving it my all!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: With you by my side, I can take on<n>the world!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes! We'll make everybody<n>happy—together!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, with our spirits renewed, we<n>set our sights on
victory!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: However...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, look! I see Dober over there!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Howdy, friend!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huh? What?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Dobeeer!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Wha—gyah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Crash!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It seems we still have a lot of work to<n>do.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, sorry! ☆
